title: CNCF and Synadia Reach an Agreement on NATS
author: Steven J Vaughan-Nichols
description: For a minute there, it looked like we were in for an ugly, legal fight over control of the NATS messaging system. But Synadia has backed off, and all's well now.
cntitle: CNCF 与 Synadia 达成 NATS 相关协议
cndescription: 有一分钟，看起来我们好像要为 NATS 消息系统的控制权进行一场丑陋的法律斗争。但 Synadia 已经退让，现在一切都好起来了。
